fields.label: Introduction
fields.message:
We want to find out what you think of your neighbourhood: what you value and what you would change if you had the chance (there are no right or wrong answers)

We also want to find out about the people in your neighbourhood

And we’d like you to tell us a little about yourself and your current situation

fields.label: Disclaimer
fields.message:
Only answer the questions you want to – you can ‘pass’ on anything you don’t want to answer. You can pause or stop the survey at any time. Everything you say is confidential and we will anonymise any information we use.

We will use what you tell us in this survey to raise awareness of what’s important to people living with dementia and their carers in Stirling and the kinds of changes you would like to see. It will take approximately 30 minutes to complete.

fields.label: End of survey
fields.message:
Thank you for taking the time to fill in our survey.  

If you are interested in taking part in further research with Our Connected Neighbourhoods, please complete the 'Staying in touch' section.

fields.label: What next?
fields.message: In the next phase of this project we plan to hold a number of workshops to look in more detail at the things that are important to you in your community/neighbourhood and the way that you use digital information. If you would be interested in being involved please provide us with your contact details below. These will be stored separately from your answers above.
